mapper.select: SELECT smap.shop_auth_id, smap.title, smap.title_flag, smap.create_time, smap.update_time, smap.enable_status, p.user_id, p.user_name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name FROM tb_shop_auth_map smap, tb_user p, tb_shop s WHERE smap.employee_id = p.user_id AND smap.shop_id = s.shop_id AND smap.shop_id = #{shopId} LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize};
SELECT count(1) FROM tb_shop_auth_map smap, tb_user p, tb_shop s WHERE smap.employee_id = p.user_id AND smap.shop_id = s.shop_id AND smap.shop_id = #{shopId}
